EmailTemplate.name: VNS_DocumentationSurvey_112011_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: VisiNet Solutions Documentation Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REMINDER - NOVEMBER 21 DEADLINE VisiNet Solutions Documentation Survey
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
TriTech is continuously looking for ways to strengthen the quality of our products and services. The Customer Satisfaction Survey completed in early September indicated that improving documentation is one of your main concerns. We are contacting you today because we would like your valuable feedback in an effort to make our documentation more accessible and useful.
Please click this link to complete a quick 5-minute documentation survey. Thank you in advance for taking the time to provide us with your candid input. The survey will close Monday, November 21.
In order to solicit responses from our general user base, please feel free to forward this email to others in your department who may be able to provide us with valuable input. If you have any questions or encounter any difficulties with this survey link, please contact Jenny Clavero from our Marketing Department at (858) 799-7362 or email jenny.clavero@tritech.com.
Sincerely,
Yvonne Stringer Quality Assurance Manager TriTech Software Systems | VisiNet Solutions
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems
9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
